# Shop POS Application

Electron + React desktop application for point-of-sale system.

## Project Status
- [x] Create copilot-instructions.md file
- [ ] Scaffold Electron + React project
- [ ] Create main Electron process files
- [ ] Build React UI components
- [ ] Implement receipt printing
- [ ] Install dependencies and test

## Tech Stack
- Electron for desktop framework
- React for UI
- CSS for styling
- Electron printing APIs for receipts
